Mike

comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Mike, looks good. Go ahead, commit it. Oleg

PS:
Currently the 'Sample code' URL on the HttpClient's site points to CVS HEAD 
which can easily cause confusion for neophytes. The URL should probably be 
changed to:

http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/jakarta-commons/httpclient/src/examples/?
only_with_tag=HTTPCLIENT_2_0_BRANCH

This is a fairly small thing, I think, so I will not open a separate bug report 
for it unless you tell me to do so.

description: The cookie docs do not reflect the latest code changes.
